Name: الرافقة
Comments: Copper only until 255 H (Diler, vol. I).

Name: الرقة
loc: Early Islamic al-Raqqa; plan of al-Raqqa in EI2, "Rakka" (M. Meinecke).
Comments: No ʿAbbāsid coinage after 254 H; (Diler, vol. I).

Name: الموصل
Comments: Almost only copper in Umayyad period, none after 268 H (Diler, vol. II).

Name: رأس العين
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
Comments: Copper only 181-224 H, 274 H (Diler, vol. I).

Name: كفرتوثا
location_certainty: confirmed remains from early Islamic times
id: Cornu: today known as Tall ʿArrada, but I could not find any references to a place of this name. It should be somewhere in this region as Ibn Hawqal describes it as being situated between Dara and Raʾs al-ʿAyn. See also EI2 ("Nasibin", Honigmann).

Name: نصيبين
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
Comments: No copper after 209 H (Diler, vol. II); only one type, dated 92 H (Album, 46).
